name: Match Manor
description:
Match Manor is a great puzzle game that can put out stress, including challenging levels to enhance your abilities. It involves matching tiles in groups of three, making it enjoyable and simple enough for players of all ages. By playing this game, you can improve your searching abilities, and solve puzzles. You can develop your sorting skills and become an expert in matching tiles. You will meet Olivia, one of the households of the manor. Help her unpack and decorate the manor, full of different rooms!


HUNDREDS OF FUN LEVELS: Keep unlocking awesome areas by playing challenging levels.

BORED OF SEEING THE SAME OBJECTS? Enjoy over 500+ unique items and fun levels.

HOW TO PLAY: Collect 3 identical items to make a match and complete the objectives to finish levels!

WATCH OUT FOR THE TIMER! Use various boosters and power-ups to beat hard levels! Earn stars by completing tile match levels. Challenge your sorting skills to find out required items among a bunch of different objects.

FEATURING UNIQUE LEVELS! Some items are trapped inside the cage, ice cubes and more! You have never seen such levels before! Get ready for new mechanics! Don’t worry, your gameplay experience is well designed to keep you away from boredom.

MEET OLIVIA! Olivia is a charming young girl who has just moved into a magnificent manor. The manor is a beautiful yet an untouched canvas, and Olivia is eager to decorate! Together, we embark on a journey to help Olivia unpack her belongings and furnish each room with creativity and style. Join us with this experience and find out her memorable pieces as we go deeper into her story.
